attributes.action: Dissolve the Scottish Devolved Administration as “unfit for purpose”!
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish Devolved Administration is acting as if it is an Independent Government. The financial and administrative conduct of the Administration is not being conducted for the benefit of the Scottish people!
attributes.background: Close down Hollyrood and Bute house in Scotland as a Devolved Administration as part of the UK Government this organisation is not functioning for the benefit of Scotland!

rejection.details:
Returning devolved powers would be a decision for the people of Scotland, rather than the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a referendum in Scotland on returning devolved powers:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333012
